body.bibl: Jones, Frederick Stanley. “John the Baptist and His Disciples in the Pseudo-Clementines: A Historical Appraisal.” In Rediscovering the Apocryphal Continent: New Perspectives on Early Christian and Late Antique Apocryphal Texts and Traditions, edited by Pierluigi Piovanelli and Tony Burke, 317–35.
